topics.body:
So I just had a thought.
Solidus was supposed to a perfect clone of Big Boss. With all of his strength, skill, and combat experience. He was also at his physical peak during the Big Shell Incident. And Raiden kicked his ass. Does this make Raiden canonically stronger than Big Boss?
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
